thread.title: China’s Hollywood Courts Women Moviegoers
thread.title_full: China’s Hollywood Courts Women Moviegoers - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: China’s Hollywood Courts Women Moviegoers
text:
BEIJING—In a gender-role reversal at the box office, the key question for Chinese movie makers has become: What do women want?
For years, movies in China were targeted mainly to male audiences. Now, Chinese movie studios are making more female-friendly films, aiming marketing campaigns directly at women—and competing to cash in on the appeal of young, male heartthrobs.
The profitability of the premise is quickly becoming...
